languages.text: "Знаешь, меня всегда тошнило от твоих проповедей. Теперь хоть уши зудеть перестанут".
"You know, I have always found your sermons nauseating. My ears will be glad to be free of them."
languages.original_text: "Знаешь, меня всегда тошнило от твоих проповедей. Теперь хоть уши зудеть перестанут".

traits.locale_text: "You know, I've always found your sermons sickening. At least those won't be giving me tinnitus anymore."
"You know, I've always found your sermons sickening. At least those won't be giving me tinnitus anymore."
"You know, I've always found your sermons sickening. At least those won't be giving me tinnitus anymore."
"You know, I've always found your sermons sickening. At least those won't be giving me tinnitus anymore."
"You know, I have always found your sermons nauseating. My ears will be glad to be free of them."
"You know, I have always found your sermons nauseating. My ears will be glad to be free of them."

languages.text: “说真的，我一听到你的说教就脑仁儿疼。要是能不用再听你唠叨，那可太好了。”
languages.original_text: "You know, I have always found your sermons nauseating. My ears will be glad to be free of them."

traits.locale_text: “老实说，我一直觉得你的布道让我恶心。至少我再也不用听你念叨个没完没了了。”

languages.text: 「お前の説教にはいつも吐き気がしてたんだ。それから解放されることを思うと、嬉しくてたまらない」
languages.original_text: "You know, I have always found your sermons nauseating. My ears will be glad to be free of them."

traits.locale_text: 「お前の説教にはいつも吐き気がしてたんだ。それから解放されることを思うと、嬉しくてたまらない」

languages.text: «¿Sabe? Sus sermones siempre me han resultado repugnantes. Mis oídos agradecerán librarse de ellos».
languages.original_text: "You know, I have always found your sermons nauseating. My ears will be glad to be free of them."

traits.locale_text: «Sabe, siempre he encontrado sus sermones enfermizos. Al menos ya no me pitarán los oídos».

languages.text: "Wisst Ihr, ich fand Eure Predigten schon immer abscheulich. Meine Ohren werden sich glücklich schätzen, sie nicht mehr hören zu müssen."
languages.original_text: "You know, I have always found your sermons nauseating. My ears will be glad to be free of them."

traits.locale_text: "Wisst Ihr, ich fand Eure Predigten schon immer widerwärtig. Zumindest bekomme ich davon nun keinen Tinnitus mehr."

languages.text: « Vous savez, vos sermons m'ont toujours donné la nausée. Mes oreilles seront ravies de ne plus avoir à subir ce calvaire. »
languages.original_text: "You know, I have always found your sermons nauseating. My ears will be glad to be free of them."

traits.locale_text: « Vous savez, vos sermons m'ont toujours donné la nausée. Mes oreilles seront ravies de ne plus avoir à subir ce calvaire. »

languages.text: "Senin şu vaazların var ya, hep midemi bulandırmıştır. Nihayet kurtuluyorum, kulaklarım bayram edecek."
languages.original_text: "You know, I have always found your sermons nauseating. My ears will be glad to be free of them."
